name: WPEssential Icons
author: WPEssential

sections.description:
WPEssential Icons is used to add the icons in supported any element. It have 4 icons library to present the icon on your desire element. No need to learn the programming code. Just install the WPEssential Icons plugin form WordPress.org.

Supported Icons Libraries

  • WPEssential IC Captain
  • WPEssential IC Elementor
  • WPEssential IC Ion
  • WPEssential IC Type
sections.installation:
Manual installation

Manual installation method requires downloading the WPessential Icons plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

Updating

Automatic updates should work smoothly, but we still recommend you back up your site.
sections.faq:
How To Install WPEssential Icons

Manual installation method requires downloading the WPessential Icons plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

short_description: WPEssential Icons is a flexible, open-source icons library for wordpress page builder. Add icons anywhere and make your way.
